lyrics:

ay this a special dedication thank yall

hey hehehe hey

verse 1 jayz

and when i reach the ledge ill tell em all to eat a dick

spread spread
you might also likechorus pharrell williams

is them telling me what i could not be oh well
hey hey
im so ambitious hey
i might hit two sisters hey

no matter what the conditions hey

when you go what i been through hey
hey if you believe it then be
then you could conceive it you see

im different i cant base what im gon be

no vision lack of ambition so wack

is them telling me what i could not be fuck off oh well

we coming for all of this respect my conglomerate

cause every deal i ever made set precedent

oh buddy what i do is make more money
